contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 4, 1951 D Forfar Festival Contest
Forfar Festival Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
forfar-festival-contest
None
Forfar, Angus, Scotland, UK March contest - 1st Clydebank, 2nd Scottish CWS, 3rd Tullis Russell. Best section 2 - Bowhill Colliery. Best section 3 - Arbroath. Best section 4 - Turriff. Best cornet, soprano and euphonium - Clydebank. Best basses and horn - Scottish CWS. Best trombone - Barry Ostlere and Shepherd. 11 bands competed.
July 9, 2016, 10:19 a.m. March 13, 2019, 12:41 p.m.
1 Cooperation Band George Hawkins
2 Clydebank Burgh Band John Hoggans
3 Tullis Russell Mills Drake Rimmer
4 Barry, Ostlere & Shepherd John Faulds
Unknown Result Arbroath Instrumental John Faulds
Unknown Result Bowhill Colliery and District Silver Band Drake Rimmer
Unknown Result Forfar Instrumental George J. Grant
Unknown Result Turriff Silver Band Unknown
